body:
I got banned on java edition years ago (before microsoft purchase) and lost my purchase just like that. No reason was given for my ban and I had absolutely no idea why I was banned, I didn't do anything illegal or anti-community as far as I was aware. I mailed them to get a reason and no response.

Had to purchase the game again. Really felt like theft.

edit: turns out it likely had to do with payment and nothing ingame.

body: From the wording this only applies to their "Realms" service and "featured servers" so I wonder if we can boycott their featured servers to let them know that participating in this type of shit is not cool. As for banning from Realms who cares honestly? They're just hurting themselves by blocking people from using their own 1st party server service. Honestly I see this shit getting walked back real quick when people start getting banned by a 12 year old who bought mod on a server with his parent's credit card and they realize giving that kind of access to moderators on their favorite servers is perhaps not the best idea.
